Articles.Content:
so i am working on makeing robotic craft for a soon opening space ship company, when i test its part that is nessecary and when i launched it to test it it exploded due to a launch tower that i want deleted, well soon we need a bigger launchpad, but here is the pic, the launcher tower is abit blurry, in the text but it isn't towards any one exceapt the tower

[ATTACH=CONFIG]33684[/ATTACH]
If you move your rocket around the VAB floor, it will spawn in a different spot on the pad. Move it closer to the default camera position, and that will give it a wider clearance of the tower.
well thanks for the mod now i need to finish my centrifuge
